class.name: VisualScriptIterator
class.brief_description: Steps through items in a given input.
class.description: This node steps through each item in a given input. Input can be any sequence data type, such as an [Array] or [String]. When each item has been processed, execution passed out the [code]exit[/code] Sequence port. [b]Input Ports:[/b] - Sequence: [code]for (elem) in (input)[/code] - Data (variant): [code]input[/code] [b]Output Ports:[/b] - Sequence: [code]each[/code] - Sequence: [code]exit[/code] - Data (variant): [code]elem[/code]
